description: Hate washing up? You can't go wrong with a one-pan chicken recipe. Combined with risoni and broccoli in passata sauce, it makes a satisfying weeknight meal.
name: One-Pan Parmesan-Crusted Chicken With Broccoli Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill on high. Combine breadcrumbs, parmesan, parsley and remaining oil. Season with pepper. Pour mixture over chicken. Place under grill and cook for 5 minutes or until topping is golden. Serve.
